00181 #define OPA_INIT_UNITY_GAIN                                                     \
00182 {                                                                               \
00183   opaNegSelUnityGain,             /* Unity gain.                             */ \
00184   opaPosSelPosPad,                /* Pos input from pad.                     */ \
00185   opaOutModeMain,                 /* Main output enabled.                    */ \
00186   opaResSelDefault,               /* Resistor ladder is not used.            */ \
00187   opaResInMuxDisable,             /* Resistor ladder disabled.               */ \
00188   0,                              /* No alternate outputs enabled.           */ \
00189   _DAC_BIASPROG_BIASPROG_DEFAULT, /* Default bias setting.                   */ \
00190   _DAC_BIASPROG_HALFBIAS_DEFAULT, /* Default half-bias setting.              */ \
00191   false,                          /* No low pass filter on pos pad.          */ \
00192   false,                          /* No low pass filter on neg pad.          */ \
00193   false,                          /* No nextout output enabled.              */ \
00194   false,                          /* Neg pad disabled.                       */ \
00195   true,                           /* Pos pad enabled, used as signal input.  */ \
00196   false,                          /* No shorting of inputs.                  */ \
00197   false,                          /* Rail-to-rail input enabled.             */ \
00198   true,                           /* Use factory calibrated opamp offset.    */ \
00199   0                               /* Opamp offset value (not used).          */ \
00200 }

00521   false,                          /* No low pass filter on pos pad.          */ \
00522   false,                          /* No low pass filter on neg pad.          */ \
00523   true,                           /* Pass output to next stage (OPA2).       */ \
00524   false,                          /* Neg pad disabled.                       */ \
00525   true,                           /* Pos pad enabled, used as signal input.  */ \
00526   false,                          /* No shorting of inputs.                  */ \
00527   false,                          /* Rail-to-rail input enabled.             */ \
00528   true,                           /* Use factory calibrated opamp offset.    */ \
00529   0                               /* Opamp offset value (not used).          */ \
00530 }
00531 
00533 #define OPA_INIT_DIFF_RECEIVER_OPA2                                             \
00534 {                                                                               \
00535   opaNegSelResTap,                /* Input from resistor ladder tap.         */ \
00536   opaPosSelResTapOpa0,            /* Input from OPA0 resistor ladder tap.    */ \
00537   opaOutModeMain,                 /* Main output enabled.                    */ \
00538   opaResSelR2eqR1,                /* R2 = R1                                 */ \
00539   opaResInMuxOpaIn,               /* Resistor ladder input from OPA1.        */ \
00540   DAC_OPA0MUX_OUTPEN_OUT0,        /* Enable alternate output 0.              */ \
00541   _DAC_BIASPROG_BIASPROG_DEFAULT, /* Default bias setting.                   */ \
00542   _DAC_BIASPROG_HALFBIAS_DEFAULT, /* Default half-bias setting.              */ \
00543   false,                          /* No low pass filter on pos pad.          */ \
00544   false,                          /* No low pass filter on neg pad.          */ \
00545   false,                          /* No nextout output enabled.              */ \
00546   false,                          /* Neg pad disabled.                       */ \
00547   false,                          /* Pos pad disabled.                       */ \
00548   false,                          /* No shorting of inputs.                  */ \
00549   false,                          /* Rail-to-rail input enabled.             */ \
00550   true,                           /* Use factory calibrated opamp offset.    */ \
00551   0                               /* Opamp offset value (not used).          */ \
00552 }
